faq - Frequently Asked Questions

Can the Frankfurt RS-232 module be used as a general CAN-interface adapter?

The Frankfurt RS-232 is built to be a low cost alternative to connect CAN4VSCP equipment to a PC or other high end device. Therefore it can only handle 125kbps as bus speed on the CAN-bus (CAN4VSCP). If you look for a good general CAN adapter we recommend the USB2CAN or the CANUSB.

Does the Frankfurt RS-232 module have galvanic isolation to the CAN bus ?

No. The upcoming module Frankfurt USB will have this protection and if there is emand for an isolated RS-232 version we will provide one.
